title: Why <details> is Not an Accordion
description: tl;dr - <code><summary></code> is a button and buttons eat semantics

title: Details / Summary Are Not [insert control here]
description: Once major browsers started supporting <details> & <summary> developers immediately started to play with them to see what sorts of patterns they could enhance or replace. This is a good thing. Experimentation pushes boundaries, improves understanding. However, we need to be careful of christening th…

title: The details and summary elements | scottohara.me
description: The details and summary elements are two of HTML’s interactive elements and together are the elements that create a native disclosure widget.
